title: Peloton, Marathon Digital, Coinbase, Spirit Airlines: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Peloton is soaring on a report it is drawing interest from suitors; Crypto stocks are following bitcoin higher
body:
Stock futures are edging up ahead of another set of major corporate earnings reports. Here’s what we’re watching in Monday’s trading:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
